framer.h File Reference

A MAC framer is responsible for constructing and parsing the header in MAC frames. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

A MAC framer is responsible for constructing and parsing the header in MAC frames.

At least the sender and receiver are required to be encoded in the MAC frame headers.

Author:
Niclas Finne <nfi@sics.se> Joakim Eriksson <joakime@sics.se>
